entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow in outlying areas overnight. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow in outlying areas in the morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
